allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: UI/UX design overhaul - modern components and interactions

- Admin dark mode: GitHub-style theme with semantic color tokens
- NewsCard: All 5 variants updated with modern shadows and animations
- HeroCarousel: Crossfade transitions, progress bar, play/pause control
- Sidebar: Gradient headers, improved visual hierarchy
- Header mega menu: Slide-down animation, modern dropdown design
- Mobile menu: Slide-in panel with backdrop blur
- Toast: Accent bar, rounded design, improved icon styling
- ConfirmModal: Centered layout, gradient buttons, modern appearance

Generated with Claude Code
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Admin Bot Dashboard UI/UX Overhaul

Phase 1 - Real-time Monitoring:
- Add RegionHeatmap component showing 27 regions with health status
- Add CollectionChart with daily stats and trend visualization
- Add AlertBanner for error/warning notifications
- Connect dashboard to real APIs (/api/bot/health, /api/bot/stats)
- Implement 30s auto-refresh with toggle control

Phase 2 - UX Improvements:
- Improve log viewer with date range filters and pagination
- Add keyboard shortcuts to article management (J/K navigate, Enter open, A approve, D delete, Space select, Esc close)

Phase 3 - Scheduler Enhancement:
- Visual hour selector (24-hour grid)
- Quick preset buttons for common schedules
- Next run times preview
- Recent run history display
- Human-readable cron expression display

EOF
